item.title: My first article
item.description: Hello world welcome to my articles actually the very first :) Example code look at this, man: hello world struct MyStruct { let someText: String } let o = MyStruct(someText: "example text") print(o.someText) //"example tezt" Swift struct MyStruct { let someText: String } let o = MyStruct(someText: "example text") print(o.someText) //"example tezt" let x = MyStruct(someText: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
